name: Panpour
description: The water stored inside the tuft on its head is full of nutrients. Plants that receive its water grow large.

abilities.name: Gluttony
abilities.effect: This Pokémon eats any held Berry triggered by low HP when it falls below 50% of its HP, regardless of the Berry's usual threshold.
abilities.description: Encourages the early use of a held Berry.

abilities.name: Torrent
abilities.effect: When this Pokémon has 1/3 or less of its HP remaining, its water-type moves inflict 1.5× as much regular damage.
abilities.description: Ups WATER moves in a pinch.
